product_name: Brooks D'Lite Low Rise Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A long run under a hot sun is no problem for the D'Lite Low Rise Shorts from Brooks. Lightweight and breathable, they're designed keep you comfortable no matter how many miles you log.
